verses.verse: I seriously urge you before God and the Lord Jesus Christ, who will judge the living and the dead at his appearing and kingdom,
preach the word, be instantly ready [whether] the time [is] suitable or not, rebuke, scold, and urge them on with all long suffering and doctrine.
For the time will come when they will not put up with sound doctrine but according to their own sinful desires--[and] having tickling ears--will multiply for themselves teachers,
and will turn away their ears from the truth, turning instead to fables.
Instead you need to clear-headed in everything, endure troubles, do the work of an evangelist; make full proof of your ministry.
For I am now ready to be offered; the time of my departure is at hand.
I have competed in a good contest. I have finished my race. I have kept the faith.
And besides there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness which the Lord, the righteous judge, will give me on that day and not only me but also all those who love his appearing.
Be diligent to come to me quickly,
for Demas--loving this present world--has forsaken me and is gone to Thessalonica. Crescens [left] for Galatia [and] Titus to Dalmatia.
Only Luke is with me. Take Mark and bring him with you, for he is useful to me for the ministry.
I have sent Tychicus to Ephesus.
The traveling coat that I left at Troas with Carpus, when you come, bring [it] and the books, especially the parchments.
Alexander the coppersmith did me much harm; may the Lord reward him according to his works.
You beware of him also, for he has greatly withstood our words.
At my first defense nobody came to help me, instead all forsook me; may it not be counted against them.

Nevertheless the Lord stood with me and strengthened me, so that the message through me might be carried out to its fullest and that the Gentiles might hear; and I was rescued out of the mouth of the lion.
And the Lord will rescue me from every wicked work and will keep me for his heavenly kingdom. To him be glory forever and ever. Amen.
Greet Prisca and Aquila and Onesiphorus' family.
Erastus stayed at Corinth, but I left Trophimus at Miletum sick.
Do your very best to come before winter. Eubulus greets you as well as Pudens, Linus, Claudia, and all the brothers.
The Lord Jesus Christ is with your spirit. May grace be with you all. Amen.
